author: Craig Laparo
comment: Looks cool, but it's too big for my LG G Watch. The horizontal layout barely fits but isn't centered.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Craig, Thanks for your rating and review. We apologize for the inconvenience you are facing. Could you please the snapshot of dial in LG G Watch and send it to wearables@insideglobe.com we can fix it for sure and will update you shortly.

author: Tim Kroupa
comment: This face really is great, and unique.  I do wish the colors were more customizable.  I would also like to be able to adjust settings from within wear app as well.  Still 5 stars though.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Tim , Thanks for your Valuable feedback and  support :)

title: Love it! But...

author: Fernando Hurtado
comment: It used to be good, but since the marshmallow android wear update it just became extremely ugly and buggy

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Fernando! We have currently updated our watchface where you can use it without any issues on your OS version. Also, we have also worked of few bug fixes and performance improvements. Please, do verify with it and reconsider your review & rating.

title: Do not buy this watchface

author: Michael Rebar
comment: I like the face, so far...but a few more colors would be nice. Personally, I'd like a darker blue...like navy blue with silver bars. ;-) I deducted a star because the face often stutters on wake and takes a sec to update. This has been corrected on other watch faces. So, I suspect it can be corrected here, too.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Michael, We are happy to know that you like the watch face.  We will consider your proposition in our next update, Thanks for your Support

title: More colors, please!

author: Marmot J. Marmot
comment: Could not change settings, so I restarted my phone and watch. Right now the watch will not finish rebooting. I've removed the app. I hope when the battery dies in the watch it will be OK. Edit :it's OK. Could use more color and font choices.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Marmot,WE like to know further from you to solve this issue ,send us an email to wearables@insideglobe.com, check this link http://goo.gl/kFsfRJ for more details, Kindly reconsider your reviews, Thank you

title: It's ok

author: Some Dude
comment: A notification popped up advertising a watch face on my shade. As soon as I blocked notifications from this app it went away.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Kermode, Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue.  We'd like to look into it further for you to get it set up soon ,Thanks for your Feedback

title: Notification ads

author: Kyle A. Morris
comment: Every time I try to access the settings the page is blank. If I could change the settings I think I would rate this much better.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Kyle! We have recently launched an update to our watchface in which you can now configure your watchface settings right from your smartphones wear app. Kindly check with it and also please do reconsider your review.

title: Nice looking watch

author: Tudor Munteanu
comment: Stop. Just stop doing this.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Tudor, Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue.  We'd like to look into it further for you to get it set up soon ,Thanks for your Feedback

title: Notification ads

author: Billy Chea
comment: The new update fixed the face.  I love it! Thank you!

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback..!

author: Brendan Bale
comment: Love the look of this watch face but it doesn't fit the lg G watch screen correctly please fix

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: its fixed now.. you may check it out now. kindly reconsider your review

title: Not centered on lg G watch

author: Zach Bauleke
comment: Great app but recently have been having frequent crashes, after restarting and reinstalling the app

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hello Zach, We have fixed the things in the recent update of  the app now you can switch on/off the watch setting sure your watch will long hours as we save battery, check this link http://goo.gl/kFsfRJ for more details, Kindly reconsider your reviews, Thank you

title: Great design, software buggy

author: Shaun Slade
comment: I gave the 5th star now that you've updated with some colour change options. Love it.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Thanks for your great support :)

title: Crystal clear

author: Ravitej Chittala
comment: Great and clean looking watch face. Easy to read and looks futuristic. However, there is no customization options available, just a blank page. please update with settings for a 5 star rating this app deserves!

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content:
Thank you for your review. We updated and released Time Gauge 2.0. Long press the dial, touch the settings icon and choose horizontal or vertical dial and your favorite color.
We welcome your continuous support.

title: Love it but please let us choose the colors!

author: Dustin Cole
comment: I tried this watch face and I found it hard to read. Also, the pictures show it with multiple colors, but I could find no setting to change without the from black to something else. Also, when it's in the vertical orientation, a good chunk of time is covered up by notifications, so if you have a notification, you can't tell what hour it is.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hello Dustin, We have fixed the things in the recent update of  the app now you can switch on/off and change the color in the setting, check this link http://goo.gl/kFsfRJ for more details, Kindly reconsider your reviews, Thank you

title: Hard to read

author: BALA VIJAY
comment: Have it one full day then you will understand the real value

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Thanks for your support :)

title: Amazing

author: michael tracy
comment: Installed this watch face for my lg g watch. Isn't correctly centered and there is no option to fit it correctly.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: now it supports LG G watch perfectly.. kindly reconsider your review

title: Watch face is cut off

author: Bob Sumner
comment: Downloaded this app got the watch face but no settings

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: A long press on the dial leads you to the settings. Please read here for more http://insideglobe.com/time-gauge-watch-face/
